name: Fire Emblem Fates: Conquest
synopsis: Fire Emblem Fates comes in two versions, each with their own story to tell. Join Hoshido in Fire Emblem Fates: Birthright, or fight alongside Nohr in Fire Emblem Fates: Conquest. Choose to stay with the beloved Nohrian siblings you grew up with, though they're not related by birth. Can you and your royal siblings survive long enough to stop a war?
